name: Chief's Quest
description:
The game is about the young warrior Mikasi from the tribe Big Bird.
Mikasi's father instructed his son to find and bring home the mischievous little sister.
The hero goes on a journey in search of the missing sister. The road is full of dangers.
Dire animals and evil spirits inhabit these lands.
Brave and courageous Mikasi is ready to challenge all difficulties!
